summary: The ProtobufJSONPayloadConverter cannot handle binary protobuf fields because it requires Node.js Buffer class which is not accessible in workflow context. This prevents workflows from encoding/decoding protobufs with binary data using this converter.
userImpact: Workflows cannot serialize or deserialize Protocol Buffer messages containing binary fields when using the ProtobufJSONPayloadConverter.
rootCause: The proto3-json-serializer library requires Node.js Buffer class for binary field encoding/decoding, but Buffer is not available in the workflow execution context.
resolutionDetails: Issue was closed, indicating a fix was implemented to provide Buffer access or alternative binary handling in workflow context.
keyQuote: workflows cannot encode/decode protobufs that contain binary data by using this converter
